team.name: Harvey Mmangisa
team.bio: Harvey Mmangisa is a Malawian tech entrepreneur and founder of Octet Systems. His work focuses on cybersecurity, smart digital solutions, and practical IT innovation for businesses and communities. With a passion for empowering people through technology, Harvey builds systems that solve real problems in areas like web development, networking, AI awareness, and digital safety. He also drives tech education initiatives through trainings and awareness campaigns â€” helping more people in Malawi use technology confidently, safely, and productively.

team.name: Vincent Ngoma
team.bio: Vincent handles administration and web development, leveraging his background in Business Information Technology from MUST to ensure operational efficiency and deliver robust web solutions.

team.name: Tsanzo Makuya
team.bio: With a degree in Computer Networks Engineering from UNIMA, Tsanzo specializes in designing and managing resilient network infrastructures and exploring innovative AI applications.

team.name: Victoria Kankhokwe
team.bio: Victoria combines her ICT knowledge from Mzuni with a passion for cybersecurity to drive business growth and help clients strengthen their digital defenses.

team.name: Prince M'bwinja
team.bio: Prince leads our communications and marketing efforts, crafting compelling narratives that connect our technology solutions with the clients who need them most.

team.name: Bright Mataya
team.bio: A skilled software developer with an ICT degree from Dae Yung University, Bright is passionate about building high-quality, scalable software that solves real-world problems.

portfolio.title: MedVet Ltd
portfolio.description: A comprehensive web portal for a leading pharmaceutical supplier, featuring an e-commerce platform and resource library.

portfolio.title: DroneLink Malawi
portfolio.description: An interactive mapping and data visualization platform for drone-based agricultural surveying.

portfolio.title: Joyful Kids
portfolio.description: A fun and educational website for a charity organisation, designed to teach children about local wildlife.

portfolio.title: DJ Bubblegum
portfolio.description: A vibrant, media-rich portfolio website for an international music artist, featuring tour dates and an integrated music player.
